events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
Based on the customer's request for a return and refund, the issue is categorized under the Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to the refund specialist team to handle the request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your item and get a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item does not match the description on your website, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the information. You can return the item within 14 days. Once we receive it back, we will process your full refund immediately.
Thanks for the clear instructions. I will send the item back today and expect the refund as you described.
We have received your returned item, and your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect in your account.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As you confirmed everything is settled, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our service.
